500.title: Will be back soon !
500.subtitle: An temporary error occurred on our side.
500.description: Our teams are already mobilized to solve the problem: try to access this page again in a few minutes!

auth.registerMyCompany: I want to register my company
auth.recontactDesc: Are you a company? Send us your email, we will get back to you shortly to help you create your Corppooling account.

header.whereDoYouGo: Where do you want to go?

home.description: The carpooling app dedicated to businesses

tutorial.searchPassenger: Share where you want to go. Maybe someone else wants to go there too!
tutorial.searchDriver: Register your trip on the app to let your colleagues travel with you.
tutorial.talkPassenger: Talk to the driver to agree on a price and meeting point that suits you.
tutorial.talkDriver: Talk to the passenger to agree on the price and meeting point.
tutorial.carPassenger: On the road! You can now enjoy your trip.
tutorial.carDriver: Great! You're traveling at a lower cost and can make new connections.

news.title: News
news.news1Title: Receive up to €100 in Carpooling Bonus!
news.news1Desc: Drivers, good news: your good habits are rewarded! Take advantage of the Carpooling Bonus by making 3 carpools in 3 months.
news.news2Title: Double your Carpooling Bonus of €100 with Corppooling
news.news2Desc: Do you hit the road every day? Good news ! Receive a €100 carpooling bonus by carpooling 10 trips in 3 months* with Corppooling.

bonusCorppooling.title: Why Corppooling?
bonusCorppooling.bonus1Title: Your favorite trips at low prices
bonusCorppooling.bonus1Desc: Wherever you are going, by bus or carpooling, find the ideal route from our wide choice of destinations at low prices.
bonusCorppooling.bonus2Desc: We take the time to get to know our members and partner bus companies. We check reviews, profiles and IDs. So you know who you are going to travel with to book with confidence on our secure platform.
bonusCorppooling.bonus3Desc: Booking a trip becomes even easier! Easy to use and equipped with advanced technologies, our app allows you to book a trip nearby in no time.
